name: Icewind Dale: Trials of the Luremaster
name_original: Icewind Dale: Trials of the Luremaster
description:
Icewind Dale: Trials of the Luremaster is a RPG game. It was originally released in 2001. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Icewind Dale: Trials of the Luremaster on PC.
It was produced by Chris Parker and Darren Monahan. It was scored by Jeremy Soule.
